page.title: 10A day in the life of Sarah
page.content: My name is Sarah.I get up at 7 o'clock in the morning.I get washed and dressed and I go downstairs for breakfast.Then I clean my teeth.I read or go out to play before school.At ten to nine I put my coat and get my books.I walk to school with my brother Ian.At school the teacher marks the register and then we go to assembly.In class I do writing and sums and have my milk.At playtime I play with Helen and Lindsey and Karen and we play catchy with Craig and Wesley.Lunchtime I have dinner at school and then I play with Victoria.When I come home I have my tea and afterwards I go outside to play.Tonight I am going to a club.When I come home I get washed and I have supper.Then I go to bed at 8 o'clock.
